text: Reno Omokri (born 1974) is a Nigerian author, lawyer, social media influencer, former presidential aide and political activist. He served as the Special Assistant to former President Goodluck Jonathan. In April 2024, Reno Omokri advised Christians in Nigeria not to pay tithes to their pastors but to pay taxes to the government. According to him, this is the only way Nigeria can progress. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1974 births Category:Nigerian lawyers Category:Nigerian politicians Category:Nigerian activists
